plot: A heartbroken newlywed science teacher destroys his house while a young Elvis impersonator and his wife move in next door.
title: Baby Let's Play House
plot_es: A heartbroken newlywed science teacher destroys his house while a young Elvis impersonator and his wife move in next door.
plot_en: A heartbroken newlywed science teacher destroys his house while a young Elvis impersonator and his wife move in next door.
